ModMetaData.name: Numbers
ModMetaData.author: TalliDown
ModMetaData.description: Note: I updated this mod because I hate playing without this awesome mod. I am sharing it, because I imagine other people feel the same. If Mehni gets around to updating this mod, I will of course take my version down. Adds a customizable general overview tab, allowing you to see any stats on all your colonists or prisoners in a single window. Original by koisama. Updated and expanded by Mehni. Updated for game version 1.1 by TalliDown.
